mapper.select: SELECT COUPON_ID, COUPON_DISCOUNT_RATE, COUPON_AVAILABLE_TYPE, COUPON_TITLE, COUPON_EVENT, COUPON_NUMBER, MEMBER_ID FROM (SELECT ROWNUM R, COUPON_ID, COUPON_DISCOUNT_RATE, COUPON_AVAILABLE_TYPE, COUPON_TITLE, COUPON_EVENT, COUPON_NUMBER, MEMBER_ID FROM (SELECT C.COUPON_ID, C.COUPON_DISCOUNT_RATE, C.COUPON_AVAILABLE_TYPE, C.COUPON_TITLE, C.COUPON_EVENT, CA.COUPON_NUMBER, CA.MEMBER_ID FROM TBL_COUPON C LEFT OUTER JOIN TBL_COUPON_ADMIN CA ON C.COUPON_ID = CA.COUPON_ID ORDER BY C.COUPON_ID DESC) P1 ) P2 WHERE P2.R BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_COUPON(COUPON_ID, COUPON_TITLE, COUPON_DISCOUNT_RATE, COUPON_AVAILABLE_TYPE, COUPON_EVENT) VALUES(SEQ_COUPON.NEXTVAL, #{couponTitle}, #{couponDiscountRate}, #{couponAvailableType}, #{couponEvent})
mapper.select: SELECT COUPON_ID FROM (SELECT ROWNUM, COUPON_ID FROM (SELECT COUPON_ID FROM TBL_COUPON ORDER BY COUPON_ID DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1 )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_COUPON_ADMIN(COUPON_ID, COUPON_NUMBER, MEMBER_ID) VALUES(#{couponId}, #{couponNumber}, #{memberId})
